title: Patching Prob
body: WHile i was trying to get on league this popped up (PATCHINH FAILED AND WERE NOT SURE WHY) okay and the restart i click restart and it happends all over again

replies.body:
It sounds like this may be happening with the Beta Client. Does this happen if you launch the Legacy Client from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file inside your installation directory?

> C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Let me know!
